solr.query_string: &fq=object_type:Communities.Metagenome-*&q={!type=edismax !boost b=product(tax_abundance,tax_level) qf='tax_level_description' v=$qq}{!type=edismax !boost b=product(func_abundance,func_level) qf='func_level_description' v=$qq}{!join from=metagenome_id to=metagenome_id qf='tax_level_description func_level_description' v=$qq}
